With the latest Intel® processor, a modern graphics card, and an immersive FlickerFree screen, this is one of HP's best laptops for gaming at peak performance.

Features

Get a fresh perspective

Windows 11 provides a calm and creative space where you can pursue your passions through a fresh experience. From a rejuvenated Start menu, to new ways to connect to your favorite people, news, games, and content—Windows 11 is the place to think, express, and create in a natural way.

AMD Ryzen™ 6000 Series Processors

Speed meets endurance when you play with a gaming laptop powered by AMD Ryzen™ processors. Seize the pure performance you need to win, without compromising battery life.

AMD Radeon™ RX 6650M Series Mobile Graphics

Radeon™ RX 6650M XT and Radeon™ RX 6650M graphics deliver unprecedented 1080p performance with remarkable efficiencies.

144 Hz FHD anti-glare display

Reduce frustrating lag and image ghosting with a display that combines a 144 Hz refresh rate and a 1080p resolution for smooth, crisp gameplay.

Eyesafe® Certified Display

Eyesafe® certified displays meet TÜV low blue light requirements and Eyesafe® standards for protecting your eyes from harmful blue light without distorting colors. Laptops with integrated Eyesafe® displays help reduce eyestrain and improve eye comfort when working for long periods of time.

DTS: X® Ultra Technology

By producing authentic, spatially accurate 3D sound through any headset, this technology offers specially tuned audio modes for different game types to provide immersion for the best entertainment experience possible.

An exceptionally rich audio experience

With HP Dual Speakers, HP Audio Boost, and custom tuning by the experts at Bang & Olufsen, entertainment comes to life with sound you can feel. Awaken your senses with PC audio perfection.

Ocean-bound plastic

Built with the environment in mind, our laptop design includes sustainable materials like ocean-bound plastic in the speaker enclosure and recycled aluminum.

Keyboard keycaps contain post-consumer recycled plastic

We're bringing a more sustainable design to our keyboards by using keycaps made with post-consumer recycled plastic.

HP Fast Charge

When your laptop is low on power, no one has time to wait hours to recharge. Power down your device and go from 0 to 50% charge in approximately 30 minutes.

Effortlessly connected

Enjoy faster speeds, improved performance, greater capacity and lower latencies than earlier iterations with Wi-Fi 6E technology.
